name: 甘奈
text:
わぁ……！
綺麗な着物がいっぱい……！
trans: Woah...! There's so many pretty kimonos...!

name: 甜花
text:
にへへ……
甜花……ここ、来たかったんだ……
trans:
Nihehe......
Tenka... wanted to come here......

name: 甜花
text:
好きな着物を選んだら、
その場で、着付けしてもらえる……
trans:
You can choose a kimono you like... and then put it on
right away......

name: 甜花
text:
あ、あと……そのまま遊びに行っても、
大丈夫って……
trans:
A-And then... you can go out... and have fun... in the
kimono......

name: 千雪
text: まぁ、素敵……！
trans: My, how wonderful...!

name: 甘奈
text: このお店、甜花ちゃんが調べたの？
trans: Did you look this one up, Tenka-chan?

name: 甜花
text:
う、うん……
ネットで……
trans: Y-Yeah...... on the internet......

name: 甜花
text:
なーちゃんも、千雪さんも……
きっと、着物似合うって、思ったから……
trans:
Tenka thought that... the two of you... would look
really good in a kimono......

name: 甜花
text:
今度は……
みんなで、着たいなって……
trans: Tenka wanted everyone... to wear one together......

name: 甘奈
text: 甜花ちゃん……
trans: Tenka-chan......

name: 甘奈
text:
ありがと、甜花ちゃんっ！
甘奈、めっちゃ嬉しいなっ！
trans: Thanks, Tenka-chan! I'm super happy!

name: 甜花
text:
なーちゃ……
あわ、わわわっ
trans: Naa-chaー...... Awa, wawawa......

name: 千雪
text:
ふふっ、私も嬉しいわ
みんなで着物……とっても楽しそう♪
trans:
Fufu, I'm happy as well. Going out together in kimono
seems like it'll be fun♪

name: 甘奈
text:
うんうん！
いっぱいあって、どれにしようか迷っちゃうよ～
trans:
Yeah for real! There's so many, I'm having trouble
deciding～

name: 甜花
text:
て、甜花も……
どれがいいのか、わかんない……
trans:
T-Tenka... doesn't know what would be good...
either......

name: 甘奈
text:
じゃあ、一緒に選ぼう！
甜花ちゃんにぴったりの着物、甘奈も探すの手伝うから☆
trans:
Then let's decide together! I'll help you find one that
looks perfect on you☆

name: 甘奈
text: もちろん、千雪さんのもね☆
trans: Of course, you can help too, Chiyuki-san☆

name: 千雪
text:
ありがとう、甘奈ちゃん
それじゃあ……よろしくお願いします♪
trans:
Thanks, Amana-chan.
Now then, let's take a look.

name: 甜花
text: よ、よろしく……おねがいします……！
trans: Th-Thank you... for helping......!

name: 甘奈
text: んー。こっちの花柄もかわいーし……
trans: Hmm. This flower pattern is really cute too...

name: 甘奈
text: わあ、この色もすっごく綺麗！
trans: Ooh, this color looks super pretty too!

name: 千雪
text: どれも素敵で、迷っちゃうわね……！
trans: They're all so nice, it really is hard to decide...!

name: 甘奈
text:
うんうん！
甜花ちゃんは、いいの見つけた？
trans: Yeah! Have you found anything good, Tenka-chan?

name: 甜花
text:
て、甜花は……
えっと……えっと……
trans: T-Tenka... um...... umm......

name: 甜花
text: こ、これ……とか、どうかなぁ……？
trans: Wh-What about...... this one... or something......?

name: 千雪
text:
わぁ、可愛い……！
甜花ちゃんに似合うと思うわ
trans: Aww, it looks cute...! I think it fits you, Tenka-chan!

name: 甘奈
text:
このおっきい花がかわいーよね！
これ……牡丹、かな？
trans:
Those big flowers are really cute! This is... a peony,
right?

name: 甜花
text: ぼたん……？
trans: Pi-oh-knee......?

name: 千雪
text:
──そうだ
着物って、柄ごとに意味やお願いごとが込められてるのよ
trans:
Yes. Kimonos actually have meanings that go along 
with the patterns.

name: 甘奈
text:
へえ……！　この牡丹は、どんな意味なんだろう？
こっちとか、他のにも意味があったりするのかな？
trans:
Whaa...! So, what meaning does the peony have?
Maybe we can find some other meaningful ones?

name: 甜花
text:
て、甜花……
調べてみる……スマホ、で……！
trans: T-Tenka will... look it up...... on her... phone......!

name: 甘奈
text:
甘奈も！　意味とか知ったら
着物選ぶの、もっと楽しくなりそうだね☆
trans:
Me too! If we know the meaning, then this could be
even more fun☆

name: 甘奈
text:
着物って、かわいーだけじゃなくて
色んな意味があるんだね
trans:
They aren't just cute, but they have a lot of meaning
to them too.

name: 千雪
text: ええ、そうなの
trans: Yes, that's right.

name: 千雪
text:
甜花ちゃんが、私たちに着物を着て楽しんでほしいって
お願いごとをしてくれたみたいに……
trans:
Just like Tenka-chan, who brought us here so that
we could enjoy the kimonos together...

name: 千雪
text:
この着物を作った人も、
着た人に幸せになってほしいってお願いを込めてたのかもね
trans:
So too did the person who made them, wanting to
make those who wear them happy.

name: 甜花
text:
お願い……
これ、着たら……幸せになれそう、かも……
trans:
Wanting to make others happy......
If we wear this... then... we can... be happy......

name: 甜花
text: にへへ……
trans: Nihehe......

name: 甘奈
text: 甜花ちゃん、おなか苦しくない？
trans: How does your stomach feel, Tenka-chan?

name: 甜花
text:
ちょ、ちょっときゅって……なってる……
でも、甜花……この感じ、好き……
trans:
I-It's a little... tight...... but... Tenka... likes how it
feels......

name: 千雪
text:
うん
着物を着ると、なんだか背筋がぴんと伸びた感じがしない？
trans:
Agreed. Doesn't your back feel straightened out
when you put on a kimono?

name: 甘奈
text:
それ、すっごくわかる……！
ねえねえ、早く外に遊び行こうよ☆
trans:
Yeah yeah, I get you...! Come on, let's get going
outside☆

name: 甜花
text: う、うん……！

name: 甘奈
text:
着物でお正月の街を歩くって……
なんか、めっちゃワクワクするね！
trans: Wearing a kimono on New Years... It's kinda exciting!

name: 甘奈
text:
ばっちりキメたし……
次はどこ行こっか！
trans: Now that we're all set... where are we headed now!?

name: 千雪
text: ……甜花ちゃんは、どうかな？
trans: ...What would you like, Tenka-chan?

name: 千雪
text:
せっかくなんだもん
甜花ちゃんの行きたい場所に行きたいな
trans:
Sorry to put you on the spot, but I'd like to go where
you want to go.

name: 甜花
text:
えっとね、甜花……
……もう１回、初詣……行きたいな……
trans:
Well, um... Tenka...... wants to go... to the shrine...
one more time......

name: 甘奈
text:
この時間だと、まだ人多いかもしれないけど
大丈夫かな……？
trans:
There's probably still a lot of people at this point,
are you sure...?

name: 甜花
text: だ、大丈夫……！
trans: D-Don't worry......!

name: 甜花
text:
これ……なーちゃんと千雪さんに、
選んでもらった着物、だから……
trans:
Tenka's... wearing a kimono... that you two picked for
her... so......

name: 甜花
text:
今の甜花……
着物装備で、防御力アップ……っ！
trans:
Right now... Tenka has the kimono equipment... so her
defense has increased......!

name: 甘奈
text: 甜花ちゃん……
trans: Tenka-chan...

name: 甘奈
text:
そうだね！
今の甘奈たちなら、なんだってできるよね☆
trans:
Good point! I feel like the three of us could do
anything right now☆

name: 千雪
text:
ええ……！
それじゃあ、神社に向かいましょうか♪
trans: Yes...! Now then, let us head on over to the shrine♪

name: 甜花
text: う、うん……！

name: 甜花
text:
なーちゃんと、千雪さんと、一緒なら……
甜花は、無敵……！
trans:
If Tenka's... with Naa-chan... and Chiyuki-san......
then... she's invincible......!
